Rat Trap had hardly enough time to dart out of the way of Cyclonus's energy=
 blast, when he suddenly catches Lord Elder's transmission, as he jumps to =
avoid a second hit.

"LORD ELDER!  AM I GLAD TA HEAR YOUR VOICE BECAUSE I C=
AN REALLY USE SOME BACK UP HERE!  I ENDED UP IN THE PREDACON BASE, AND GUES=
S WHAT?! I MET AN AUTOBOT WHO'S RELATED TA OPTIMUS PRIME!  HE'S IN MORE TRO=
UBLE THAN I AM, AND HE'S SENDN' ME OUT FOR HELP, QUESTION IS, GETTN' OUTA T=
HIS SNAKE PIT OF A BASE WITHOUT GETTN' MY AFT BLOWN OFF!"

He starts to sen=
d Lord Elder the data relating to his position and location.

"Sorry, I had=
 ta yell because of the sound of the energy blasts.  Okay, here's the skinn=
y sir, we got three trapped Autobots. Night Light who's unconcious, my new =
pal, Tucson, who came here tryn' ta save Rodimus's life, even though that l=
ousey heap of scrap doesn't deserve it for the treachery he's committed lat=
ely and yeah I am reffern' ta Rodimus Prime.  ACK!  Lousey no good GLITCH! =
 Look, I'll tell ya more when I can get outa here, that's if I get outa her=
e."

His transmission breaks after his last word.

At the torture chamber, =
Tucson's only reaction to Scorpinok is a cold one.  He was NOT about to div=
ulge anything to anyone, no matter the pain of the torture!

" Truthfully, =
you can intimidate me all you want, but I will Not betray the Autobots and =
the good name of Optimus Prime. So if you're looking for me to tell you eve=
rything, forget it, you will not get that out of me no matter if you disman=
tle me piece by piece while I'm still alive."  

He turns his head away fro=
m Scorponok.

By the Ark..

OOC: Enter Quickstride.

BIC:  Quickstride may =
not have been the brightest Maximal on the force, but he knew when a rescue=
 had to be made.  He hears Rat Trap's transmission with ears forward in equ=
ine form, and hangs his head over Lord Elder's shoulder, while chewing on s=
ome vegitation that he had found in the area, as all horses do while grazin=
g.  He swallows a mouth full of chewed up greens and thoughtfully looks to =
Lord Elder.

" I know distress when I hear it. And Rat Trap definitely soun=
ded like he needs help.  Lord Elder, with your permission I'd like to volun=
teer my services."

Replies the Stallion thoughtfully, looking to Lord Elde=
r with big blue eyes, which was rare among horses.  Breezes catch his long =
copper mane and tail as he swatts away insects with it.  


--- In nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> OOC: Enter L=
ord Elder!

> In the center of the Ark's main command center Lord Elder, =
the leader
> of the Watchers and at the moment, the lone guardian of the Ar=
k stood
> watching different computer screens, indulging one his favorite p=
ast
> times, examining the cosmos. From as far back as he could remember he=

> had always had a fascination with anything new, the stars, new
> planets=
, new places, he was a machine designed to explore.
> 
> On the screens wer=
e different views of space, a few of them were
> centered on the moon, as h=
e silently wondered exactly what was going
> on there, what were the minion=
s planning? Unfortunately he had no
> ability to peer into their very base,=
 although he could at times make
> out the dim reddish reflections from the=
 moon, the base of Unicron's
> minions.
> 
> With a sigh he looked at anoth=
er monitor, this one trained in a
> different direction. He couldn't necess=
arily see the Predacon base
> from his position, but he knew where it was a=
nd he always kept a
> sensor beam in their direction. Even with the ongoing=
 skirmishes from
> the minions, you can never put it past the Predacons to =
make an attack
> as well.
> 
> He pursed his lips slightly as he looked at =
the screen. He had seen
> Rat Trap going off in that direction. He hadn't s=
aid anything to the
> Maximal, as Rat Trap was usually more than able to ta=
ke care of
> himself, but it had been a while since he had checked in.
> 
>=
 With a casual movement Lord Elder reached down to the console in front
> o=
f him and opened an encrypted maximal channel, "Rat Trap! This is
> Lord El=
der, come it. What is your Status?"
